00098 // A typical family has a couple plus three children. 
00099 // If we consider shared watching, we might get some 
00100 // additional shared profiles. Thus, 15 profiles seems 
00101 // to be a reasonable guess.
00102 #define MAX_PROFILES_PER_TVSET  15  
00103 
00105 typedef pair<time_t, vector<int>*> tIProfileObject;
00106 
00108 typedef map<int, tIProfileObject> tIProfileMap;
00109 
00111 typedef map<int, tIProfileMap*> tIProfiles;
00112
